body: Does anyone else miss the old MC ZONE and the old people stuff im not saying that I don't want new people on but does anyone miss the old MCZONE:(
body_tagged: Does anyone else miss the old MC ZONE and the old people stuff im not saying that I don't want new people on but does anyone miss the old MCZONE:(
title: Not ment to be mean

replies.body: I'm sure everyone does, but the thing is, is that we can make new memories. :) Then these new memories that we are making will once be missed. Enjoy it while it lasts. Sure we miss Mczone, sure that we had fun back then, but we can always make new memories to look back. (: Change can be good.
replies.body_tagged: I'm sure everyone does, but the thing is, is that we can make new memories. :) Then these new memories that we are making will once be missed. Enjoy it while it lasts. Sure we miss Mczone, sure that we had fun back then, but we can always make new memories to look back. (: Change can be good.

replies.body: there should be a mczone day where only the mczone people get it play xD

replies.body:
I hate the new Nexus.
Well, not hate, but I just don't like most of the maps and kits.

replies.body: The new avicore update is great and we need to start living the future not the past, who knows they might bring it back!
replies.body_tagged: The new avicore update is great and we need to start living the future not the past, who knows they might bring it back!

replies.body: Think of mczone as an old friend that passed away. Avicus is your new best friend and you need to move on from the past and make great memories with your current best friend.
